title: Google\Cloud\Sql\V1beta4\User
name: User
description:
A Cloud SQL user resource.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.sql.v1beta4.User

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.etag
params.description: This field is deprecated and will be removed from a future version of the API.

params.name: data.name
params.description: The name of the user in the Cloud SQL instance. Can be omitted for update because it is already specified in the URL.

params.name: data.host
params.description: Optional. The host from which the user can connect. For insert operations, host defaults to an empty string. For update operations, host is specified as part of the request URL. The host name cannot be updated after insertion. For a MySQL instance, it's required; for a PostgreSQL or SQL Server instance, it's optional.

params.name: data.instance
params.description: The name of the Cloud SQL instance. This does not include the project ID. Can be omitted for update because it is already specified on the URL.

params.name: data.project
params.description: The project ID of the project containing the Cloud SQL database. The Google apps domain is prefixed if applicable. Can be omitted for update because it is already specified on the URL.

params.name: data.type
params.description: The user type. It determines the method to authenticate the user during login. The default is the database's built-in user type.
